New Records: Ja Morant recorded his 60th career point-assist double-double, tying the Memphis Grizzlies franchise record held by Mike Conley
Key Match Events: Memphis Grizzlies improved to 2-1 on the NBA season with their win over the Orlando Magic
Post-Match Reflections: The Grizzlies aim to move to 3-1 on the season with their next game against the Chicago Bulls
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ja Morant achieved the milestone in 260 career games
